item.description:
This is going to be SO much fun!

Improv Comedy is a great vehicle for embodying the art of allowing. Think about it. What does it take to allow your desires to manifest? For one - letting go. Also, getting into a flow state, present and connected, and letting whatever happens be okay. It also helps to be in a high, positive vibration of feeling good, right?

These are some of the same states you use when you "play" improv comedy! And I'm sure we'll come up with even more. Oh! I just thought of another - letting go of what others think! That's a biggie!

Our meetup member Karen Wagner is going to lead those of us who want to play through some improv games; and others can enjoy learning by observing. And of course we'll also have a discussion around how this all connects to the law of attraction and allowing our desires to manifest.

I just can't wait for this most playful of evenings! Thanks so much Karen!

Please remember to RSVP, and after you do so, please let us know if your plans change, so we wonâ€™t be waiting for you unnecessarily.

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun. Please join us!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Go to back of front lobby, near water cooler and go upstairs.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: The Art of Allowing through Improv Comedy!
